about: I have a decade of experience in design and design thinking. Over these years, I've worked on a number of Indian and international engagements including for Goldman Sachs, GE Digital, 3M India, TE Connectivity, ITC Foods, Hyatt Hotels & Portea Medical. I've a keen interest in product design. I am the Co-Founder of Mrdaa, a potteryware enterprise based out of Bangalore. I won the Best website in South India award hosted by AFAQs. I was nominated in the Print AD category hosted by Kyoorius Awards.

about:
My name is Tara, and I have 10 years of experience as a Graphic Designer. I specialize in branding, logo, icon, stationery, social media, and vector design.
  All of my artwork is made using the most up-to-date tools, and I have finished and passed my Adobe Illustrator Mastery course.

My victories and client testimonials depict my quality of work. Open and invite to Project 1-1 !

about: Hi! I am a designer with a degree in graphic design and 2 year of freelance experience. I specialize in logo design, branding and packaging. I am passionate for engaging and impactful design that helps brands to build sustainable relations with their clients. Among branding part I also design different types of social media content, such as: animation, illustration, video and motion.

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.

about:
Hi!
  I am a graphic designer/illustrator, with an art education.
  You can order logo design, packaging and branded characters from me.

about: Graduated Mimar Sinan University Fine Art School in 1995. Worked as a Creative Director and Graphic Designer in global advertising agencies for 20 years in Turkey. Many awards in graphic and advertising contests such as Crystal Apple Ad Awards, GMYK Awards, in Turkey. Started as an art director, prop stylist, set designer and professional retoucher in own studio at 2012. Part-time instructor for Food Styling for Visual Media Class, at Gastronomy and Culinary Arts at University, for 3 years.

about:
Hi! My name is Louise Curtis and I am an English qualified Freelance graphic designer and illustrator based in France, with over 20+ years experience.
  I combine eye-catching hand drawn vector illustrations alongside strong graphics for Logos, Corp id, Posters, Flyers, Brochures & Packaging design.
  Please get in touch if you like my style, I love working with clients that give constructive feedback, good communication is the key. Thanks

about:
I am Sebastian - architect, specializing in interior commercial design and graphic designer, working mostly with branding and labels.
  I have 15 years of experience freelancing both as an architect and as a graphic designer. I am very invested in the projects I take on and I enjoy working with a project from beginning to end. I am thorough and not afraid of working hard.

about:
Trabajo en el mundo del diseño gráfico hace ya más de 6 años.
  Hoy en día me dedico no solo a crear identidades visuales para mis clientes, sino que también, a transmitir experiencias únicas para ellos.
  También hago startups para perfiles de instagram, diseños de feed, diseños aislados, carteleria, folleteria, entre otros.
  Actualmente cuento con certificaciones en diseño gráfico y mi formación independiente. Además, actualmente me encuentro formandome en Licenciado en Diseño y Animación Digital.

about:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my page.
  I specialize in logo design. I strive for simplicity and minimalism in my design style. At the same time, I try to express the essence of your company in my logos. My catchy logos are simple in the perception and can lead your business to success.
  If you need the logo design done, feel free to contact me.

about: I’m a designer with 25+ years of experience in web and graphical design, book design, logo and identity design and creative direction. I worked at an international advertising companies for 16 years in Paris, France. My responsibilities included : art direction & presentations to the client. Currently, I am self-employed and am focusing on web and graphic design, book design, logo and identity & creative direction.

about: My work dwells in a netherworld between urban fine art and contemporary graphics, A collision of real and digital media it is primarily illustration based with a firm foundation in drawing, I focus mainly on the human form particularly the face, interweaving elements from the animal kingdom often reflecting the absurdity of human nature.
